thread.title: Arsene Wenger makes announcement on his Arsenal future
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger makes announcement on his Arsenal future

title: Arsene Wenger makes announcement on his Arsenal future
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Arsene Wenger makes announcement on his Arsenal future ARSENE WENGER has claimed he will definitely remain in management next season - but he is still uncertain on his Arsenal future. PUBLISHED: 09:35,  37, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 
No matter what happens, I will manage next season. 
Whether it is here or not, that is for sure. 
I hate defeat, I hate to lose games. 
I have a big responsibility at this club. It is difficult to take but I have the strength and experience 
If I said March/April, it is because I didnâ€™t know. 
I do not want to comment [on his future]. 
My future is not important, the team is and Arsenal Football Club
